page.title: 12EVENTS KING'S NYMPTON
page.content: {CHURCH FESTIVALS - ROGATION}-This is held in Early Summer at the Parish Church.A service of hymns, prayers and readings begins in the church and is continued at special locations in the village-a farmyard, the Village Green, a field of grass and a cornfield.God's blessing is asked on the plants and the crops and for the people engaged in farming. Members of both local churches share in this service. { HARVEST }The Methodist Church celebrates this Thanksgiving on the third Sunday in September and the Parish Church on the last Sunday in September.Both churches are beautifully decorated with fruit and flowers and special preachers are appointed to take the services. {HARVEST SUPPERS}After a weeknight service in each church a special supper is served for over 100 folk.
